title: What Age Do People Get Their First Periods?
content: Most girls get their first periods between the ages of 11 and 14
column3: but you might be younger or older than that when you get yours - there's no right age to get it. Ask your mother when she got her first period. It's a good indication of when yours might come.

title: What are the Signs That My Period is Coming?
content: The signs are a little different for everyone
column4: you'll get really good at reading your body. Some things to look for
column12: a big appetite and a breakout of a couple zits. You won't experience all of these symptoms before your period every month
